entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
